row.entry: Thirteen piles. Deal three cards face down and one card face up on every pile.

sect2.title: Szabályok
sect2.para: Remove cards in pairs of equal rank. Every time a card is removed, the card underneath is flipped face up and becomes playable. Empty slots are not filled.

sect2.title: Pontozás
sect2.para: Each pair of cards removed scores two points.

sect2.title: Stratégia
sect2.para: Each pile starts with four cards. The trick is to remember how many cards each slot has left at any given time so that you can try to remove cards evenly.
